summary: Rumplestiltskin`s Dagger from the TV show Once Upon A Time.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=60][b][color=#A52A2A]Rumplestiltskin`s Dagger[/color][/b][/size]
[/center]

[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/4445749-1337287666.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=35][b][color=#A52A2A]Description:[/color][/b][/size]

Rumplestiltskin`s Dagger from the TV show Once Upon A Time.

[b]Features:[/b]

- Found in the crafting menu under the steel category.
- Has a soul trap enchatment.
- Can be tempered if you have the steel smithing perk.


[size=35][b][color=#A52A2A]Changelog:[/color][/b][/size]

V1.0 (5/17/2012)

- Initial Release.


[size=35][b][color=#A52A2A]Installation:[/color][/b][/size]

- Place the Data folder in your Skyrim installation directory, Which will be located someplace like:
  ...\\Steam\\Steamapps\\common\\Skyrim
  And when it asks you to merge folders, say \"Yes to all\".

- Run the Skyrim launcher, click on \"Data Files\", and then check the box next to \"RumplestiltskinsDagger.esp\" and press ok.


[size=15][b][color=#A52A2A]My Other Mods:[/color][/b][/size]

If you like this don`t forget to endorse, and also check out my other mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15781]MOIAF - Mods Of Ice And Fire[/url]
author: TheDahaka
